```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("plotlytalk"))
```

```{r}
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + 
  geom_point()
print(g)
ggplotly(g)
```


## 3D scatterplot 
```{r}
df <- data.frame(z = rnorm(100))
df$y <- df$z * 1.5 + rnorm(100, 1, 0.5)
df$x <- df$y * 3 + rnorm(100, 1, 5)
plot_ly(df, 
    x = ~ x, 
    y = ~ y, 
    z = ~ z, 
    type = "scatter3d", 
    mode = "markers", 
    marker = list(size=2))
```
